channel.title: Projects on Mitchell's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Mitchell's Portfolio

item.title: Autonomous Combat Robot
item.description: An autonomous combat robot with real-time AI position tracking and LIDAR-based navigation.

item.title: Nylon Heat Welder
item.description: Designed a machine that presses two solid nylon rods against a hot plate and then against each other to heat weld them. The rods were wrapped around four- foot drums, and had a natural curvature to them

item.title: Hose Accumulator
item.description: A machine that goes on an assembly line to hold one end of a hose still while accumulating incoming hose

item.title: Maze Bot
item.description: Mechatronics class project to navigate through a maze without touching a wall
